data.title: Dancing Turtle Films
data.meta_description: Dancing Turtle Films is a film production company specialising in documentaries on under-reported current affairs subjects.
data.text:
Since launching in 2010, our film production studio Dancing Turtle Films has been capturing stories from around the world that are rarely reported in mainstream media. This has included documentaries on human rights, the environment, and civil resistance movements.

We have produced award-winning documentaries on topics including West Papuaâ€™s independence struggle, illegal logging in Melanesia, and the pro-democracy movement in Turkey. They have been broadcast on television in countries including the UK, Australia and Papua New Guinea, plus dozens of film festivals around the world.

Click on the images below to discover more, or visit the Dancing Turtle online store to purchase films from our catalogue.
